thread.title: 'Voice of the Bobcats' remembered for unique style in press box, classroom
thread.title_full: 'Voice of the Bobcats' remembered for unique style in press box, classroom

author: Roberto Acosta | racosta1@mlive.com
title: 'Voice of the Bobcats' remembered for unique style in press box, classroom
text: "He was so great with the mic that you could hear him all over town," recalled Lisa Stebbins, 37, a 1998 Grand Blanc High grad. "I was visiting a friend over in country House apartments, now known as Grand Oak Apartments. He was so pumped up announcing the plays and the players."
